info.title: FeeOn APIs
info.description: Documentation of All the APIs in FeeOn

get.summary: This API fetches all the list of fee types available with pagination.

parameters.name: schoolId
parameters.description: School Id

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: Account type to filter the types

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of documents to limit number

parameters.name: feeType
parameters.description: The name of the feetype

parameters.name: description

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: The account type of the feetype

parameters.name: schoolId
parameters.description: The school of the feetype

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the feetype

parameters.description: The school of the feetype
